hera.client

Interface ContextConfiguer<ConfiguerT>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AergoClientBuilder, WalletBuilder

    public interface ContextConfiguer<ConfiguerT>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConfiguerT addConfiguration(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Add a configuration with key and value.
      ConfiguerT withBlockingConnect()
      Use OkHttpConnectStrategy.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • withNonBlockingConnect

        ConfiguerT withNonBlockingConnect()
        Use NettyConnectStrategy. If other ConnectStrategy is already set, that will be overridden.
        Returns:
        an instance of this

      • withBlockingConnect

        ConfiguerT withBlockingConnect()
        Use OkHttpConnectStrategy. If other ConnectStrategy is already set, that will be overridden. This method works for jdk 1.7 or higher.
        Returns:
        an instance of this

      • withTimeout

        ConfiguerT withTimeout(long timeout,
                       java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Set timeout for each request with SimpleTimeoutStrategy. If timeout is already set, that will be overridden.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time to time out
        unit - time's unit
        Returns:
        an instance of this

      • withRetry

        ConfiguerT withRetry(int count,
                     long interval,
                     java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Use RetryStrategy. Default retry count : 0, default retry interval : 5000 milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        count - retry count. If it is less than 0, set as 0
        interval - interval value. If it's less than 0, set as 0
        unit - interval unit
        Returns:
        an instance of this
